items.sentence: What were you doing about this time yesterday?
What would you do if Tom asked you to do that?
You\'re probably too young to understand this.
Tom usually sits in the back of the classroom.
I\'ve been waiting all day for this to happen.
I\'ve been wanting to do that for a long time.
I\'ve been working here for a couple of years.
I\'ve never heard you complain about anything.
I\'ve never written a letter in French before.
We should\'ve heard something from Tom by now.
